The module %s requires PHP %s to work properly. Please upgrade your server configuration.

trans-unit.target: Both 'xml' and 'zip' files attributes must be provided to use the local channel.

trans-unit.target: We couldn't find a PrestaShop version in the .zip file that was uploaded in your local archive. Please try again.

trans-unit.target: %s does not exist or is not a directory.

trans-unit.target: Your current PHP version isn't compatible with PrestaShop %s. (Expected: %s - %s | Current: %s)

trans-unit.source: Your store's root directory %s isn't writable. Provide write access to the user running PHP with appropriate permission & ownership.
trans-unit.target: Your store's root directory %s isn't writable. Provide write access to the user running PHP with appropriate permission & ownership.

trans-unit.source: The %s directory isn't writable. Provide write access to the user running PHP with appropriate permission & ownership.
trans-unit.target: The %s directory isn't writable. Provide write access to the user running PHP with appropriate permission & ownership.

trans-unit.source: Files can't be downloaded. Enable PHP's "allow_url_fopen" option or install PHP extension "cURL".
trans-unit.target: Files can't be downloaded. Enable PHP's "allow_url_fopen" option or install PHP extension "cURL".

trans-unit.source: Maintenance mode needs to be enabled. Enable maintenance mode and add your maintenance IP in [1]Shop parameters > General > Maintenance[/1].
trans-unit.target: Maintenance mode needs to be enabled. Enable maintenance mode and add your maintenance IP in [1]Shop parameters > General > Maintenance[/1].

trans-unit.source: PrestaShop's caching features needs to be disabled. Disable caching features in [1]Advanced parameters > Performance > Caching[/1].
trans-unit.target: PrestaShop's caching features needs to be disabled. Disable caching features in [1]Advanced parameters > Performance > Caching[/1].

trans-unit.source: PHP's max_execution_time setting needs to have a high value or needs to be disabled entirely (current value: %s seconds).
trans-unit.target: PHP's max_execution_time setting needs to have a high value or needs to be disabled entirely (current value: %s seconds).

trans-unit.source: Apache mod_rewrite needs to be enabled.
trans-unit.target: Apache mod_rewrite needs to be enabled.

trans-unit.source: The following PHP extensions need to be installed:
trans-unit.target: The following PHP extensions need to be installed:

trans-unit.source: The following PHP functions need to be allowed:
trans-unit.target: The following PHP functions need to be allowed:

trans-unit.source: PHP memory_limit needs to be greater than 256 MB.
trans-unit.target: PHP memory_limit needs to be greater than 256 MB.

trans-unit.source: PHP file_uploads configuration needs to be enabled.
trans-unit.target: PHP file_uploads configuration needs to be enabled.

trans-unit.source: Unable to generate private keys using openssl_pkey_new. Check your OpenSSL configuration, especially the path to openssl.cafile.
trans-unit.target: Unable to generate private keys using openssl_pkey_new. Check your OpenSSL configuration, especially the path to openssl.cafile.

trans-unit.source: It's not possible to write in the following folders. Provide write access to the user running PHP with appropriate permission & ownership:
trans-unit.target: It's not possible to write in the following folders. Provide write access to the user running PHP with appropriate permission & ownership:

trans-unit.source: The version of PrestaShop does not match the one stored in database. Your database structure may not be up-to-date and/or the value of PS_VERSION_DB needs to be updated in the configuration table.
trans-unit.target: The version of PrestaShop does not match the one stored in database. Your database structure may not be up-to-date and/or the value of PS_VERSION_DB needs to be updated in the configuration table.

trans-unit.source: Your current version of the module is out of date. Update now [1]Modules > Module Manager > Updates[/1]
trans-unit.target: Your current version of the module is out of date. Update now [1]Modules > Module Manager > Updates[/1]

trans-unit.source: We were unable to check your PHP compatibility with PrestaShop %s.
trans-unit.target: We were unable to check your PHP compatibility with PrestaShop %s.

trans-unit.target: Some core files have been altered or removed. Any changes made to these files may be overwritten during the update. [1]See the list of changes.[/1]

trans-unit.target: Backup requested for deletion does not exist.

trans-unit.target: An error occurred while formatting the backup name.

trans-unit.target: При создании резервной копии возникла ошибка. Невозможно получить схему %s
Ошибка при создании резервной копии базы данных.
Резервное копирование базы данных. Осталось таблиц: %s...
Запись в директорию резервных копий запрещена (%path%).

trans-unit.target: No valid tables were found to back up. Backup of database canceled.

trans-unit.target: Невозможно создать файл резервной копии базы данных %s.

trans-unit.target: Backup filename has not been set

All files have been added to archive.
All files saved. Now backing up database
trans-unit.target: Все файлы сохранены. Идет резерное копирование базы данных

trans-unit.target: Открываем резервную копию БД %filename% в режиме %extension%

trans-unit.target: Файл восстановления базы данных %filename% готов. Осталось файлов: %filescount%...

trans-unit.target: Restoration process done. Congratulations! You can now reactivate your store.

trans-unit.target: File %s is missing: unable to restore files. Operation aborted.

trans-unit.target: No backup database files found: it would be impossible to restore the database. Operation aborted.

trans-unit.target: Не удалось извлечь файл %filename% в директорию %directoryname%.
Файлы восстановлены. Идёт восстановление базы данных...

trans-unit.target: Shop updated to %s, but some warnings have been found.

trans-unit.target: Shop updated to %s. Congratulations! You can now reactivate your shop.

trans-unit.target: The temporary directory of modules has been emptied

trans-unit.target: All files updated. Now updating database...

trans-unit.target: Error when trying to update file %s.

trans-unit.target: The translation files have been merged into file %s.

trans-unit.target: Завершение, так как не удаётся проверить, что папка %s содержит корректную версию PrestaShop.

trans-unit.target: Возможно, отсутствует файл или релиз был по ошибке помещён в подпапку.

trans-unit.target: Unable to find files to update.

trans-unit.target: Вы должны включить allow_url_fopen или cURL для работы автоматической загрузки. Также возможна ручная загрузка файлов в %s.

trans-unit.target: Загрузка завершена, однако суммы MD5 не совпадают (%s).

trans-unit.target: The .zip archive could not be downloaded. The update is currently impossible. Please try again later.

trans-unit.target: Update database in progress. %d queries left

trans-unit.source: Error during database update. You may need to restore your database.
trans-unit.target: Error during database update. You may need to restore your database.

trans-unit.source: Database updated. Now updating your Addons modules...
trans-unit.target: Database updated. Now updating your Addons modules...

trans-unit.target: Version to install is too old. Current version: %oldversion%. Version to install: %newversion%.

trans-unit.source: Temporary files directory has been emptied
trans-unit.target: Temporary files directory has been emptied

trans-unit.source: Unable to extract %filepath% file into %destination% folder...
No prestashop/ folder found in the ZIP file. Aborting.
trans-unit.target: В архиве отсутствует папка prestashop/. Отмена действия.

trans-unit.source: File extraction complete. Now updating files...
trans-unit.target: File extraction complete. Now updating files...

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the module instance of %s failed.
trans-unit.target: Retrieving the module instance of %s failed.

trans-unit.source: Module %s does not need to be migrated. Module is up to date.
trans-unit.target: Module %s does not need to be migrated. Module is up to date.

trans-unit.source: Your store is currently running the latest compatible version. No updates are needed at this time.
trans-unit.target: Your store is currently running the latest compatible version. No updates are needed at this time.

trans-unit.source: Downloading step has been skipped, update process will now unzip the local archive.
trans-unit.target: Downloading step has been skipped, update process will now unzip the local archive.

trans-unit.source: Store deactivated. Now downloading... (this can take a while)
trans-unit.target: Store deactivated. Now downloading... (this can take a while)

trans-unit.source: MD5 hash will be checked against %s
Before continuing with your tasks, please review the following checklist to ensure smooth operation after recent recovery.
trans-unit.target: Before continuing with your tasks, please review the following checklist to ensure smooth operation after recent recovery.

trans-unit.source: %startbold%Open the developer documentation%endbold% to keep this checklist at-hand.
trans-unit.target: %startbold%Open the developer documentation%endbold% to keep this checklist at-hand.

trans-unit.source: %startbold%Disable the maintenance mode%endbold% in General settings > Maintenance.
trans-unit.target: %startbold%Disable the maintenance mode%endbold% in General settings > Maintenance.

trans-unit.source: If you can't access your back office, try emptying the cache.
trans-unit.target: If you can't access your back office, try emptying the cache.

trans-unit.source: Backing up your store's files, database, and images means you can restore to a previous version if something goes wrong during the update. This keeps your data safe and ensures your business stays up and running.
trans-unit.target: Backing up your store's files, database, and images means you can restore to a previous version if something goes wrong during the update. This keeps your data safe and ensures your business stays up and running.

trans-unit.source: Please try again or perform a manual backup. In any case, ensure you have a backup before starting the update to avoid any data loss.
trans-unit.target: Please try again or perform a manual backup. In any case, ensure you have a backup before starting the update to avoid any data loss.

trans-unit.source: It is available at /your-admin-directory/autoupgrade/backup. You're ready to start the update now.
trans-unit.target: It is available at /your-admin-directory/autoupgrade/backup. You're ready to start the update now.

trans-unit.source: Unlock the local update feature and manually update your store to your preferred upgrade by saving the archive and XML files of the PrestaShop version in the following directory on your server: %pathToLocalArchive%
trans-unit.target: Unlock the local update feature and manually update your store to your preferred upgrade by saving the archive and XML files of the PrestaShop version in the following directory on your server: %pathToLocalArchive%

trans-unit.source: You are already using the latest PrestaShop version available but you can update to the version of your choice from a local archive.
trans-unit.target: You are already using the latest PrestaShop version available but you can update to the version of your choice from a local archive.

trans-unit.source: A more recent version is available
trans-unit.target: A more recent version is available

trans-unit.source: A more recent version of PrestaShop is available. You can also use a local archive.
trans-unit.target: A more recent version of PrestaShop is available. You can also use a local archive.

trans-unit.source: Please try again. You can also send us an error report to help us improve the Update assistant module.
trans-unit.target: Please try again. You can also send us an error report to help us improve the Update assistant module.

trans-unit.source: Update your store to benefit from the latest improvements, bug fixes and security patches.
trans-unit.target: Update your store to benefit from the latest improvements, bug fixes and security patches.

trans-unit.source: Use this feature if the update failed or if your store or a module is no longer working properly.
trans-unit.target: Use this feature if the update failed or if your store or a module is no longer working properly.

trans-unit.source: No backup file found on your store.
trans-unit.target: No backup file found on your store.

trans-unit.source: Your store is up to date
trans-unit.target: Your store is up to date

trans-unit.source: Before continuing with your tasks, please review the following checklist to ensure smooth operation after recent updates.
trans-unit.target: Before continuing with your tasks, please review the following checklist to ensure smooth operation after recent updates.

trans-unit.source: %startbold%Re-enable and check your modules%endbold% one by one to prevent any compatibility issue.
trans-unit.target: %startbold%Re-enable and check your modules%endbold% one by one to prevent any compatibility issue.

trans-unit.source: %startbold%Make sure your store's front office is working properly:%endbold% try to create an account, place an order, add a product, etc.
trans-unit.target: %startbold%Make sure your store's front office is working properly:%endbold% try to create an account, place an order, add a product, etc.

trans-unit.source: If some images don't appear in the front office, try regenerating thumbnails in Preferences > Images.
trans-unit.target: If some images don't appear in the front office, try regenerating thumbnails in Preferences > Images.

trans-unit.source: If something's wrong, you can restore a backup with this module. Your backup is available at {admin}/autoupgrade/backup.
trans-unit.target: If something's wrong, you can restore a backup with this module. Your backup is available at {admin}/autoupgrade/backup.

trans-unit.source: If you can't access your back office, try enabling the debug mode manually in config/defines.inc.php by setting _PS_MODE_DEV_ to true.
trans-unit.target: If you can't access your back office, try enabling the debug mode manually in config/defines.inc.php by setting _PS_MODE_DEV_ to true.

trans-unit.source: Select the backup you want to restore to
trans-unit.target: Select the backup you want to restore to

trans-unit.source: All the modules installed after creating your store are considered non-native modules. They might be incompatible with the new version of PrestaShop. We recommend deactivating them during the update.
trans-unit.target: All the modules installed after creating your store are considered non-native modules. They might be incompatible with the new version of PrestaShop. We recommend deactivating them during the update.

trans-unit.source: If you've customized email templates, your changes will be lost if you activate this option.
trans-unit.target: If you've customized email templates, your changes will be lost if you activate this option.

trans-unit.source: Overriding is a way to replace business behaviors (class files and controller files) to target only one method or as many as you need. This option disables all classes & controllers overrides, allowing you to avoid conflicts during and after updates.
trans-unit.target: Overriding is a way to replace business behaviors (class files and controller files) to target only one method or as many as you need. This option disables all classes & controllers overrides, allowing you to avoid conflicts during and after updates.

trans-unit.source: Your store may not work properly anymore. Select the backup you want to use and restore it to avoid any data loss.
trans-unit.target: Your store may not work properly anymore. Select the backup you want to use and restore it to avoid any data loss.

trans-unit.source: You didn’t back up your store with the Update assistant module but you can restore using your own manual backup.
trans-unit.target: You didn’t back up your store with the Update assistant module but you can restore using your own manual backup.

trans-unit.source: You are about to delete the %backup_name% backup made on %backup_date%. As it's your only backup, you will be redirected to the module's home page.
trans-unit.target: You are about to delete the %backup_name% backup made on %backup_date%. As it's your only backup, you will be redirected to the module's home page.

trans-unit.source: You are about to delete the %backup_name% backup made on %backup_date%.
trans-unit.target: You are about to delete the %backup_name% backup made on %backup_date%.

trans-unit.source: You are about to restore %backup_version% using the backup from %backup_date%.
trans-unit.target: You are about to restore %backup_version% using the backup from %backup_date%.

trans-unit.source: Your files, database, and images will be backed up.
trans-unit.target: Your files, database, and images will be backed up.

trans-unit.source: Your files and database will be backed up.
trans-unit.target: Your files and database will be backed up.

trans-unit.source: Before starting the update, make sure you have a complete and recent backup of your store (database, files, and images).
trans-unit.target: Before starting the update, make sure you have a complete and recent backup of your store (database, files, and images).

trans-unit.source: You are about to launch the update, do you want to continue?
trans-unit.target: You are about to launch the update, do you want to continue?

trans-unit.source: I have made my own backup and can restore it manually if a problem occur.
trans-unit.target: I have made my own backup and can restore it manually if a problem occur.

trans-unit.source: Help us improve the module by sending us this error report. For your information, the logs will be attached with your message. You can add more details in the description if you wish.
trans-unit.target: Help us improve the module by sending us this error report. For your information, the logs will be attached with your message. You can add more details in the description if you wish.

trans-unit.source: Learn more about your data and your rights
trans-unit.target: Learn more about your data and your rights

trans-unit.source: You can add details about the error here.
trans-unit.target: You can add details about the error here.

trans-unit.source: The requested page or resource could not be found. This might be due to:
trans-unit.target: The requested page or resource could not be found. This might be due to:

trans-unit.source: The page being moved or deleted.
trans-unit.target: The page being moved or deleted.

trans-unit.source: It seems there was an issue with the server. This type of error usually happens when:
trans-unit.target: It seems there was an issue with the server. This type of error usually happens when:

trans-unit.source: There's a misconfiguration or unexpected problem on the server.
trans-unit.target: There's a misconfiguration or unexpected problem on the server.

trans-unit.source: It looks like there is no data received from the server. This can happen if:
trans-unit.target: It looks like there is no data received from the server. This can happen if:

trans-unit.source: There's an issue with the network or connection.
trans-unit.target: There's an issue with the network or connection.

trans-unit.source: The request timed out. It seems the connection took too long to respond. This could be due to:
trans-unit.target: The request timed out. It seems the connection took too long to respond. This could be due to:

trans-unit.source: A slow or unstable internet connection.
trans-unit.target: A slow or unstable internet connection.

trans-unit.source: The server is currently busy or unresponsive.
trans-unit.target: The server is currently busy or unresponsive.

trans-unit.source: The response received from the server in malformed. This can happen if:
trans-unit.target: The response received from the server in malformed. This can happen if:

trans-unit.source: The request did not reach the module.
trans-unit.target: The request did not reach the module.

trans-unit.source: There’s an issue processing the response on the app or browser.
trans-unit.target: There’s an issue processing the response on the app or browser.

trans-unit.source: An unknown error occurred. It was unexpected and may be caused by a temporary issue with the server.
trans-unit.target: An unknown error occurred. It was unexpected and may be caused by a temporary issue with the server.

trans-unit.source: Save the archive file of the version you want to update to in the following directory: /your-admin-directory/autoupgrade/download/
trans-unit.target: Save the archive file of the version you want to update to in the following directory: /your-admin-directory/autoupgrade/download/

trans-unit.source: The maximum version of PrestaShop to which you can upgrade your store, based on its PHP version.
trans-unit.target: The maximum version of PrestaShop to which you can upgrade your store, based on its PHP version.

trans-unit.source: No archive found in the following directory: /your-admin-directory/autoupgrade/download/
trans-unit.target: No archive found in the following directory: /your-admin-directory/autoupgrade/download/

trans-unit.source: Once all the following conditions are met, you can continue with the update. Read more in the [1]developer documentation[/1].
trans-unit.target: Once all the following conditions are met, you can continue with the update. Read more in the [1]developer documentation[/1].

trans-unit.source: Please consider these warnings before continuing with the update. Read more in the [1]developer documentation[/1].
trans-unit.target: Please consider these warnings before continuing with the update. Read more in the [1]developer documentation[/1].

trans-unit.source: The requirements check is complete, you can update your store to this version of PrestaShop.
trans-unit.target: The requirements check is complete, you can update your store to this version of PrestaShop.
